titles.title: Directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to place a real time display of the United States gross national debt in the House Chamber.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 4/14/2011--Introduced. Directs the Clerk of the House of Representatives to place a real-time display of the federal gross national debt, as calculated by the Secretary of the Treasury, in the House chamber in clear view of the Members.
